title: Zero Waste Gifts for the Eco Hero in Your Life - Mindful Momma
author: Mindful Momma
description: Find unique zero waste gifts that are practical but also fun to use - including durable, reusable products for use in the home and on-the-go.
cleaned_text: Find the best non-toxic face moisturizers to hydrate and nourish dry skin with clean, natural and organic ingredients. Thank you to EarthHero for sponsoring this post. All thoughts and opinions are my own. The older I get, the more I want the gifts that I give to be useful. Gone are the days when I might give someone a knick-knack that will sit and collect dust on the shelf. Not only do I love giving gifts that are useful, I want them to be eco-friendly too. I've found that zero waste gifts are perfect, because they are super useful and they replace wasteful disposable products, making them very sustainable. If you have an eco-hero or zero waste advocate in your life - or even someone who you want to give a nudge in the right direction, you'll want to check out this list of zero waste gifts including high-quality, durable reusable products that can be used in daily life over and over again. Top Zero Waste Gifts for Home & On-the-Go These gifts can all be found at one of my favorite online stores: [EarthHero](https://mindfulmomma.com/EarthHero). EarthHero is an online marketplace dedicated to helping people find products that are eco-friendly, non-toxic and sustainable. Their large assortment of products includes home goods, outdoor goods, personal care products, clothing and accessories, baby gear, kids toys and more. The products I've shared here range from inexpensive stocking stuffers, to gift sets that will help kickstart anyone's sustainable journey.
